repairedDockerfile:
FROM ubuntu:16.04 
MAINTAINER Derrick Shultz <warlock05@gmail.com> 
RUN apt-get update && apt-get install --no-install-recommends -y --force-yes lame madplay ezstream && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*;
VOLUME ["/ezstream", "/music"] 
ENTRYPOINT ["/usr/bin/ezstream", "-c", "/ezstream/ezstream.xml"]
